sentences.sContent: 10 staff were allocated to the task.
...has reorganised its medical staff into teams to focus on particular treatment areas; consultants...
...a large proportion of staff are temporary contractors...
...Leaders have to be able to delegate and manage resources wisely – including staff expertise...
...Nobody flourishes in a gloomy environment with irresponsible staff and a poor safety record...
...The staff are equipped with iPads to take your payment while you relax on a sofa...
...smartphones and　other devices into the hands of medical staff for instant access to patient data...
...The students and food-service staff planted and took care of the vegetables that they would later use as ingredients on their pizzas...
...announced that embassy staff would interview more than 100...
...Hill says that his staff asks diners whether they would like to share their meals...

phrases.pCn: 参谋长；司令；办公室主任
员工管理；教职员管理；[经]参谋管理
支持人员；支援幕僚；后勤人员

remMethod.val: 每个明星(star) 后面都跟着一群工作人员(staff)

trans.tranOther: People who are part of a particular staff are often referred to as staff
